channel.title: RapidShare Links-Help Me Pease!
channel.description:
Whenever I search for movies on the net or something I always get Rapidshare links instead of full downloads!! I was just wondering, what do I do with all of em?! Lol. For example; Here are the rapidshare links for X-Men:The Last Stand:
http://rapidshare.de/files/25093285/X-Men3.part01.rar http://rapidshare.de/files/25103621/X-Men3.part02.rar http://rapidshare.de/files/25115321/X-Men3.part03.rar http://rapidshare.de/files/25129881/X-Men3.part04.rar http://rapidshare.de/files/25129962/X-Men3.part05.rar http://rapidshare.de/files/25126247/X-Men3.part06.rar http://rapidshare.de/files/25158289/X-Men3.part07.rar http://rapidshare.de/files/25126617/X-Men3.part08.rar
Now I downloaded the first 1, but it wont play! Can somone help me out and tell me what to do with all these links? Im a noob at this, any help would be appreciated thanks.

download them all, just them all int he same folder, extract the first prat with winrar, enjoy ur move
